text: NGC 3981 is a spiral galaxy located 62 million light-years away in the constellation of Crater. It was discovered on February 7, 1785 by William Herschel. NGC 3981 is a member of the NGC 4038 Group which is part of the Virgo Supercluster. ==See also== * Galaxy ==References== ==External links== * *NGC 3981 on SIMBAD 3981 Category:NGC 4038 Group Category:Crater (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies 037496 Category:UGCA objects 289 Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1785 Category:Discoveries by William Herschel
title: NGC 3981
